class KeySchema[source]

KeySchema(hash_key:Optional[Any]=None, range_key:Optional[Any]=None, _user_instantiated:bool=True, **attributes:Any) :: Model

Defines a PynamoDB Model

This model is backed by a table in DynamoDB. You can create the table by with the create_table method.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class Tester(Querier, KeySchema):
  class Meta:
    aws_access_key_id = ACCESS_KEY_ID
    aws_secret_access_key = SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
    table_name = DATABASE_TABLE_NAME
    region = REGION
    billing_mode='PAY_PER_REQUEST'
    dax_read_endpoints = [DAX_ENDPOINT] if DAX_ENDPOINT else None
    dax_write_endpoints = [DAX_ENDPOINT] if DAX_ENDPOINT else None
  pass
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
